pop_scale.name: Population scale factor
pop_scale.tip: Multiplier for results (to approximate large populations)

pop_size.name: Population size
pop_size.tip: Number of agents simulated in the model

pop_infected.name: Initial infections
pop_infected.tip: Number of initial seed infections in the model

rand_seed.name: Random seed
rand_seed.tip: Random number seed (set to 0 for different results each time)

beta.name: Beta (infectiousness)
beta.tip: Probability of infection per contact per day

contacts.name: Number of contacts
contacts.tip: Average number of people each person is in contact with each day

web_exp2inf.name: Time to infectiousness (days)
web_exp2inf.tip: Average number of days between exposure and being infectious

web_inf2sym.name: Asymptomatic period (days)
web_inf2sym.tip: Average number of days between exposure and developing symptoms

web_dur.name: Infection duration (days)
web_dur.tip: Average number of days between infection and recovery (viral shedding period)

web_timetodie.name: Time until death (days)
web_timetodie.tip: Average number of days between infection and death

web_cfr.name: Case fatality rate
web_cfr.tip: Proportion of people who become infected who die
